WorkItem.Description:
Version: Rawr (Official) Rawr-v0.40.zip
Steps to reproduce: open and close the bank frame, /rawr export, use "Load from Rawr Addon" in Rawr
Â 
The items won't show up in Rawr (the exported XML only contains "<Bank></Bank>").
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] Items in bank are not exported

Comments.Message: It works for me, not sure how to t/s this with your character

I think there is a typo in the code (Rawr.db.BankItems vs Rawr.BankItems):

Rawr.lua:
"function Rawr:UpdateBankContents()
	Rawr.db.BankItems = {}
	Rawr.db.BankItems.count = 0
	for index = 1, 28 do
		local _, _, _, _, _, _, link = GetContainerItemInfo(BANK_CONTAINER, index)
		if link then
			Rawr.db.BankItems.count = Rawr.db.BankItems.count + 1
			Rawr.db.BankItems[Rawr.db.BankItems.count] = link
(...)"

Export.lua:
"function Rawr:ExportBank()
	local bag, slot
	self:AddLine(2, "<Bank>")
	for index = 1, Rawr.BankItems.count do
		Rawr:WriteAvailableItem(3, Rawr.BankItems[index])
	end
	self:AddLine(2, "</Bank>")"
